sorcer.util

Class ProviderLookup

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.util.ProviderLookup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, DiscoveryListener, DynamicAccessor

    public class ProviderLookup
extends Object
implements DiscoveryListener, DynamicAccessor
    A class which supports a simple Jini multicast lookup. It doesn't register with any ServiceRegistrars it simply interrogates each one that's discovered for a ServiceItem associated with the passed type/signature of a provider.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void discarded(DiscoveryEvent anEvent)
      When a ServiceRegistrar "disappears" due to network partition etc. we will be advised via a call to this method - as we only care about new ServiceRegistrars, we do nothing here.
      void discovered(DiscoveryEvent event)
      Everytime a new ServiceRegistrar is found, we will be called back on this interface with a reference to it.
      static Service getProvider(String serviceType)
      Returns a SORCER service provider with the specified service type, using a Cataloger if availabe, otherwise using Jini lookup services.

      • getProvider

        public static Service getProvider(String serviceType)
        Returns a SORCER service provider with the specified service type, using a Cataloger if availabe, otherwise using Jini lookup services.
        Parameters:
        serviceType - a provider service type (interface)
        Returns:
        a SORCER service provider

      • discovered

        public void discovered(DiscoveryEvent event)
        Everytime a new ServiceRegistrar is found, we will be called back on this interface with a reference to it. We then ask it for a service instance of the type specified in our constructor.
        Specified by:
        discovered in interface DiscoveryListener

      • discarded

        public void discarded(DiscoveryEvent anEvent)
        When a ServiceRegistrar "disappears" due to network partition etc. we will be advised via a call to this method - as we only care about new ServiceRegistrars, we do nothing here.
        Specified by:
        discarded in interface DiscoveryListener
